Detailed Description

A Modifier which applies Legacy joint parameters / mesh binding.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzLegacyJoint::~DzLegacyJoint (  )  [virtual]

Destructor.

DzLegacyJoint::DzLegacyJoint ( const DzInFile *  file  )  [protected]

For internal use only.

This constructor is called by the Framework when loading from a file so that certain initializations can be skipped that will happen later in the file load process.

Parameters:
file The file from which this object was loaded.

Adds a joint parameter to this binding.

Parameters:
param The joint parameter to add to this binding. The modifier takes ownership of the parameter.
DzError DzLegacyJoint::apply ( DzObject *  obj,
DzVertexMesh &  geom,
DzNode &  node 
)

Calculates the affect of this joint on the given node and mesh, and transforms the mesh accordingly.

Parameters:

node The node that the geometry belongs to

bool DzLegacyJoint::bendingOn (  )  const
Returns:
true if bending is on for this joint
See also:
setBending()
DzLegacyJoint * DzLegacyJoint::findJoint ( const DzNode *  bone  )  [static, slot]

Searches the given node and its parents for a "DzLegacyBinding" modifier. Then searches the modifier for a joint that binds to the given bone.

Parameters:
bone A pointer to the bone to find the joint binding for.
Returns:
A pointer to the joint modifier that binds to the bone, NULL if none was found.
DzLegacyJointParam * DzLegacyJoint::findJointParam ( const QString &  name  )  const [slot]
Parameters:
name The name of the parameter to find.
Returns:
The parameter set with the given name, if any.

Returns:
The property that controls bending for this modifier
DzNode * DzLegacyJoint::getBone (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
The node that this joint binds the mesh to.
QString DzLegacyJoint::getGroupName (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
The name of the face group in the mesh that this binding is applied to.
QObjectList DzLegacyJoint::getJointParams (  )  const [slot]

This function is provided for DAZ Script access - plug-in developers should use jointParamsIterator() instead.

Returns:
A list of joint parameters for this joint.

Saves the Bending On/Off property and Joint parameters list to the native file format.

Parameters:

Reimplemented from DzElement.

void DzLegacyJoint::setBending ( bool  onOff  ) 

Sets bending on/off for this binding. If bending is on, vertex bindings are calculated via the rest of the joint parameters, otherwise, all verts for this object are considered fully bound.

Parameters:
onOff true to turn bending on, false to turn bending off
See also:
bendingOn()
void DzLegacyJoint::setBone ( DzNode *  bone,
bool  createAlais = true 
) [slot]

Sets the node that this joint binds the mesh to.

Parameters:
bone The node that this joint binds to.
void DzLegacyJoint::setGroupName ( const QString &  groupName  )  [slot]

Sets the name of the face group that this binding is limited to.

Parameters:
groupName The name of the face group for the binding.

short  sectionID,
short  pointerID,
DzBase *  ptr 
) [virtual]

Sets the Bending On/Off property and the list of Joint Parameters when read from the native file format.

Parameters:
file The file being read
sectionID The ID of the section being read
pointerID The ID of the pointer being read

Reimplemented from DzElement.

void DzLegacyJoint::setStorablePaths ( const QString &  path  )  [virtual]

Classes that contain items derived from DzStorable should override this method to give them a chance to set their storage path. The path passed is relative (no leading drive letter or root path).

Parameters:
path The base path for storables.

Reimplemented from DzBase.
